content.en: Algorithmic advancements: Researchers have been investigating the use of algorithms to improve various aspects of prostate cancer treatment. These algorithms, such as the narrow band deformable registration algorithm and the deformable image registration method, are being used to accurately map MRI/MRSI data onto CT images for radiation therapy planning, integrate MRI and MRSI information into TRUS-guided robotic prostate biopsy, and co-register T2-weighted images of the prostate with pathological slices, among other applications. These advancements in algorithmic technology have the potential to enhance the accuracy and effectiveness of prostate cancer diagnosis and treatment.
content.da: Algoritmiske fremskridt: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af algoritmer for at forbedre forskellige aspekter af behandling af prostatakræft. Disse algoritmer, såsom narrow band deformable registration algorithm og deformable image registration method, bruges til nøjagtigt at kortlægge MRI/MRSI-data på CT-billeder til planlægning af stråleterapi, integrere MRI- og MRSI-information i TRUS-vejledt robotstyret prostata-biopsi og korrekstregistrere T2-vægtede billeder af prostata med patologiske snit, blandt andre anvendelser. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmeteknologi har potentiale til at øge nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af diagnose og behandling af prostatakræft.
